summary: E2E smoke test follows project patterns (Puppeteer + Jest, try/catch/finally, takeScreenshot on error). Both test cases cover the required flows per task acceptance criteria. Helper functions are well-documented with JSDoc. Two minor suggestions for improvement.

findings.finding: DEX app click logic is duplicated between Happy Path and No Wallet Fallback tests. The 30-line page.evaluate block + fallback logic is identical in both test cases. Should be extracted into a shared helper function.
findings.suggestion: Extract into a `clickDexApp(page)` helper function alongside the other helper functions at the top of the file.

findings.finding: In Happy Path test, both waitForIframeFrame and waitForBridgeReady are called sequentially with the same DEX_IFRAME_PATTERN. waitForBridgeReady already searches for the iframe internally, so waitForIframeFrame is redundant â€” but it provides useful logging about iframe load timing.
findings.suggestion: No change needed. The separate waitForIframeFrame call provides clear step-by-step logging and separates iframe load confirmation from bridge ready confirmation, which aids debugging.
